headline: GOP state majority leader slams far-right MAGA rep for proposing Wisconsin retract electoral votes for Biden: 'It is illegal'
author: Alex Henderson
sentences:
But Jim Steineke, the Republican who serves as majority leader for the Wisconsin State Assembly, has slammed Ramthun’s proposal as “illegal.”
In case you've heard otherwise: Wisconsin Republican leaders rejected a resolution to 'pull back' 2020 electoral voteshttps://www.jsonline.com/story/news/politics/elections/2022/01/26/wisconsin-gop-rejects-resolution-pull-back-2020-electoral-votes/9223622002/\u00a0\u2026
— Molly Beck (@Molly Beck) 1643205752
Steineke tweeted, “Rep Ramthun just attempted to pass an Assembly resolution to recall WI’s presidential electors.

Kari Lake, a Republican candidate for governor in Arizona, then tweeted to her 107,315 followers ‘**HUGE BREAKING NEWS** — Wisconsin Assembly Votes to Withdraw Its 10 Electors for Joe Biden in 2020 Election.’ As of Tuesday morning (January 25), the tweet reporting inaccurate information was still up despite Gateway Pundit recasting the story.

More than a year into Joe Biden’s presidency, some far-right MAGA Republicans in Wisconsin continue to promote the false, totally debunked claim that former President Donald Trump really won the state.
In the Wisconsin House of Representatives, Ramthun has been a vocal supporter of the "Big Lie" — repeatedly claiming that the election was stolen from Trump because of widespread voter fraud.

#EndofStory.”
But the Milwaukee Journal Sentinel’s Molly Beck notes that even though Steineke forcefully shot Ramthun’s proposal down, some far-right MAGA Republicans have claimed otherwise.

The tweet had been liked more than 11,000 times and shared by more than 5000 people.”
Rep Ramthun just attempted to pass an Assembly resolution to recall WI\u2019s presidential electors.
But that false claim has been totally debunked, and vote recounts have made it abundantly clear that Biden won Wisconsin’s ten electoral votes fair and square.
One of them is State Rep. Timothy Ramthun, who has introduced a resolution calling for Wisconsin to take back the ten electoral votes that were cast for Biden.

#EndofStory
— Jim Steineke (@Jim Steineke) 1643151184
Predictably, the Gateway Pundit attacked Steineke as “corrupt” and a RINO (Republican In Name Only).
Beck reports, “Popular conservative website Gateway Pundit falsely reported the move had been successful.
\n\nAs chair of the Rules Committee, there is ZERO chance I will advance this illegal resolution.
As chair of the Rules Committee, there is ZERO chance I will advance this illegal resolution.
\n\nNot only is it illegal, it\u2019s just plain unconstitutional.
Not only is it illegal, it’s just plain unconstitutional.
